personal.name: Praveen Ramisetti
personal.summary: Innovative Senior Full Stack Developer with 7+ years of experience in building scalable web applications. Proven track record of improving system performance and leading agile teams. Passionate about cloud architecture and open-source contribution.

experience.description: • Led a team of 5 developers to migrate a monolithic legacy app to a microservices architecture using Node.js and Docker. • Reduced server response time by 40% by optimizing database queries and implementing Redis caching. • Collaborated with product managers to define feature roadmaps and technical specifications.
